title: Ticket #4532: Transfer Test moving folder contents to top of sandbox using /
description:
With all the file transfer tests we do have we do not test the option of filefolder/.

job_slash_transfer.run is done and displays the windows transfer bug while running everywhere else.
check_ins: 2014-Aug-14 08:48   Check-in [40967]: The main thing here is the new slash transfer test which works everywhere but windows. As such it is in the skip list for windows but since it needs a condor running, it is in the personal list for tests which get a personal condor spun up. This commit turns on the test and also turns on job_basic_suspend_continue_test [...] (By Bill Taylor )
creator: bt
